participant_abstract.sent: We evaluated our product and agreed upon the joystick-style ("broccoli") design.
We decided that the base would be detachable and offered in different fruit colors.
Production costs were calculated at 11.9 euros/unit.

participant_actions.sent: Project leader will write meeting minutes and final report.
ID, UID, and ME will fill out this survey and the questionnaire and then go home.

participant_decisions.sent: Multiple color options for the base of the remote.
Single iPod-style wheel and button for control.
Batteries inserted into side of control panel.

participant_problems.sent: We were not sure how to calculate the production costs because we were not sure what "single curve", "double curve" cases, etc. meant.
Modelling clay at meeting is a serious distraction -- too much fun.
